name: LearnAboutDetoxification
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
As the old adage goes, "You are what you eat". Unfortunately, it has to take a cliché for us to be reminded that eating canned foods, for instance, give you some protein and nothing else but a variety of garbage in the guise of preservatives, artificial food colors and flavors with tongue-twisting names. 

The body responds to these and other toxins by neutralizing and segregating them to a degree that the body can tolerate. 

However, at some point your system becomes overloaded with toxins that you start feeling symptoms like headaches, joint pains, frequent colds, sore throat, constipation, chronic fatigue, allergy, high blood cholesterol and so much more. 

Detoxification is a method of purging toxins from the body so you will be revitalized from virtually every cell promoting body functions. Any type of detox methods is beneficial for our system but not everyone is fit to immerse in a detox program. 

Talk to your doctor and have a physical examination prior to engaging in such. People with chronic diseases and other ailments may not be able to withstand the whole duration of a detox program.

Learn About Detoxification, tips and tricks , from our short daily flash briefings. 

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
